name: ZombieApocalypse
description:
This Is My First Game Where You Play With A Guy Named "BOB", And Fight Against Endless Amount Of Zombies With Different Powers And Looks.

This Is v1.0 And It's Kinda Basic But More Is Coming Soon.

If You Played The Game And Enjoyed It, Make Sure To Tell Me Your Opinion :)

Types Of Zombies:

Green Zombie(Normal)

Blue Zombie(Fast) Faster Than (Normal)

Brown Zombie(Dirt) Shoots Projectilies (Mud)

Black Zombie(???) You Cant Kill Him, You Must Wait 10 sec For Him To Disappear

Red Zombie(Strong) Stronger Than (Normal)

Light Green(Lime)

Orange Zombie(Hulk) Faster And Less Healthier Than (Strong)

I Will Soon But All Of This In The Next Update :)
